descriptionHtml:
A small mod adds several rings. The rings are enchanted and have good visuals. Rings are created in any forge (One gold Ingot and one common soul gem needed) . All the enchantment only visually. Enchantment can be removed. All effects last until the ring is not removed. 


List of rings:
Shimmering golden ring (make you look like ghost) (based on Philter of the Phantom)
Shimmering broken golden ring (make you look like dark ghost) (based on Nightingale Sentinel npc)
Dragon nature ring (gives Dragon Aspect effects)
Poсket sun ring (make you glow) (based on Stendaar's spells)
Bats ring (create a swarm of bats around you) (based on vampire spell)
Violent fire ring (make you burn)

V 4.1 bug fix
author: WarFoxy
